title: Independence National Historical Park: Blind / Low Vision
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Blind / Low Vision              Blind / Low Vision       Touch objects There are reproduction articles that can be touched in the following buildings:   Benjamin Franklin Museum Congress Hall Fragments of Franklin Court Franklin Court Printing Office Liberty Bell Center New Hall Military Museum  Audio description Audio description is available on all park films in the following buildings:     Benjamin Franklin Museum Declaration House Independence Visitor Center   Audio description is available for some of the exhibits at the Germantown White House (Deshler-Morris House).  Audio description for the exhibits in the Benjamin Franklin Museum will be available in the future.   Braille booklets  The park map is available to use on-site in Braille at the following locations:     Independence Visitor Center Liberty Bell Center Independence Hall Congress Hall Benjamin Franklin Museum
